div.p: RB MSS M198, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.
MS annotation by Tepper: 'Reply 18.6.93'. Letter not found. 16/6/93

p.seg: Heute, lieber Herr Tepper, erhalte ich Nachricht, dass der Premier, Mr Patterson die Bewilligung gegeben, dass ein Suppl. der Flora in der Gov. Printing Office gedruckt werde. Wollen Sie dies gütig auch unseren Landsleute Hr Krichauff u Hr. Holtze mittheilen

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Today, dear Mr Tepper, I received information that the Premier, Mr Patterson, gave permission that a supplement of the Flora be printed in the Government Printing Office. Would you kindly communicate this also to our fellow-countrymen Mr Krichauff and Mr Holtze.
See M to O. Tepper, 4 May 1893, and annotations on M to T. Wilson, 8 April 1893 (in this edition as 93-04-08b). For analyses of the dispute between M and F. M. Bailey about the authorship of the proposed supplement to Flora australiensis (i.e. Bentham (1863-78)), see Clements (1998).

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
